title: VPN Cost Lab
description: Estimate AI deployment spend step-by-step: each request path, policy rule, and routing tradeoff stays visible so teams can reason from evidence to decision.

title: Neural Glass
description: Learn how a neural network turns raw signals into predictions in 90 seconds, with concepts, weights, and confidence made visible.

title: Kinetic Proof
description: Learn how evidence-heavy governance flows work under pressure: validation, schema checks, and decision outcomes are visible end-to-end.

title: Policy Gatekeeper
description: Turn policy checks into a visual routing system you can teach from: policy tickets, rule evaluation, escalation, and outcome signals stay visible all the way through.

title: The Kinetic Kitchen 2.0
description: Watch an AI agent workflow as a restaurant order: intake, routing, escalation, and completion. No code, no jargon. Learners see decisions, guardrails, edge-case handling, and KPI behavior as the order moves.
